name: ejaytc.github.io
description: This is my personal space to **document every project, setup, experiment, and solution**, step by step.   It’s where I capture everything I do—from the initial idea to final implementation—along with the lessons I learn along the way. ## Here, you’ll find: - **Project Logs:** Detailed step-by-step records of what I build, including ideas, planning, code snippets, and implementation.   - **Setup Notes:** Guides, configurations, and tools I use to get projects running smoothly.   - **Solutions & References:** Practical solutions, workarounds, and references for problems I encounter, so others (or future me) can quickly find answers.   - **Lessons Learned:** Insights from what worked, what didn’t, and how I can improve next time.   - **Tips & Tricks:** Practical techniques, shortcuts, or approaches I discover during development or experimentation. ## Purpose The purpose of this journal is simple:   > To turn every project, success, and failure into a **complete learning resource**, so I can revisit it, refine it, and build upon it in the future. Whether you’re following along, looking for inspiration, or seeking solutions to similar problems, welcome.   This is a space to **learn, build, solve, and grow step by step**—one project at a time.
